maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Restricted Area
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Zone Interdite
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.note: reminds me of Zone Capital spoof

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: We are terribly sorry, dear player.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Nous sommes vraiment désolés, cher joueur.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Ce pont est actuellement en cours de réparation.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: We are terribly sorry, dear player.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Nous sommes vraiment désolés, cher joueur.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Accès Refusé

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: We are terribly sorry, dear player.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Nous sommes vraiment désolés, cher joueur.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: This bridge is currently under repair.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Ce pont a besoin d'être réparé.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: We are terribly sorry, dear player.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Nous sommes vraiment désolés, cher joueur.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: This bridge is currently under repair.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Ce pont a besoin d'être réparé.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Access Denied
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Accès Refusé

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Access Denied
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Accès Refusé

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: We are terribly sorry, dear player.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Nous sommes vraiment désolés, cher joueur.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: We are currently investigating a malfunction in these fences.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Nous sommes en train de diagnostiquer un problème de fonctionnement avec ces barrières.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Salut !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Oh?\. Good day, Lea.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Oh ?\. Bonjour, Lea.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Having a stroll around Rhombus Square?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: On visite déjà la ville ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Oh, who are you? A new member of the First Scholars?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Oh, qui êtes-vous ? Un nouveau membre des Premiers Érudits ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Yes, she just joined a couple weeks ago.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Oui, elle nous a rejoints il y a quelques semaines.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Well then, I hope you're enjoying CrossWorlds, young lady!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Alors j'espère que la jeune dame apprécie CrossWorlds ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Lea!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Lea !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Oh, yes! I'm Ivan. Nice to meet you!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Ah, oui ! Je suis Ivan. Ravi de faire votre connaissance !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Actually, something quite peculiar about her...\. It seems her speech module isn't working.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: En fait, Lea a quelque chose de particulier...\. On dirait que son module vocal est défectueux.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Oh, it isn't? She just said her name though, didn't she?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Oh, vraiment ? Pourtant elle vient de dire son nom, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: We believe she is using some kind of workaround that allows her to say a few words.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: On pense qu'elle utilise un moyen de contournement qui lui permet de dire quelques mots.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Hi!\. Bye.\. How.\. Why.\. Sorry.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Salut !\. Bye.\. Comment.\. Pourquoi.\. Désolée.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: This is...\. very strange.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: C'est...\. très étrange.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I'd suggest you contact support, but if you already rely on a workaround like this, the problem must be really persistent.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Je vous suggère de contacter le support, mais si vous dépendez déjà d'un contournement comme cela, c'est que le problème doit être tenace.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: You think there is anybody you could talk to about this?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Tu connais quelqu'un qui pourrait nous en dire plus ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Not really...\. I'm unfortunately out of touch with the development department.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Pas vraiment...\. Je n'ai pas vraiment de contact avec l'équipe de développement.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I expected as much.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Je m'y attendais.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: There was that one time when I tried to promote some research projects to integrate upcoming AI technologies.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Il y avait cette fois ou j'ai voulu faire monter un projet de recherche pour intégrer des nouvelles technologies d'IA.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I talked to some of the engineers back then.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: J'ai parlé avec quelques ingénieurs à l'époque.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: But it wasn't met with a lot of enthusiasm, so I gave up on it. It's really a shame.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Mais l'idée ne leurs a pas beaucoup plu, donc j'ai abandonné. C'est vraiment dommage.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.note: die Idee stieß auf wenig Gegenlieb, les a pas emballée

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I heard that Instatainment cut down on the R&D department in general, didn't they?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: J'ai cru entendre qu'Instatainment a réduit le budget du département R&D en général, non ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: That's pretty much the case, yes.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: C'est ce que l'on peut dire, oui.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Why?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Business is going well enough and most shareholders want to avoid risks as much as possible.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Les affaires vont bien en ce moment, et la plupart des actionnaires veulent minimiser les risques.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Instatainment has lost much of its innovative spark these days.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Instatainment à perdu beaucoup de son ancien esprit d'innovation.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Oh, is it that late already? It's time for me to go.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Oh, il est déjà si tard ? Il est temps que j'y aille.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Anyway, it was nice to see you again, Albert! Until next time!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Mais bon, c'était agréable de te revoir, Albert ! À la prochaine !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Sure, just let me know when you have some free time again.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Avec plaisir. Tu peux me joindre si tu as de nouveau un peu de temps.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Have a nice day, everyone!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Passez une bonne journée, tout le monde !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Bye!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Bye !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Logout
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Déconnexion

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Well then, I have to leave as well.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Bon, il faut que j'y aille aussi.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Good bye!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: À plus !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Bye!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Bye !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Who was that person?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Qui était cette personne ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: He seems to be closely involved with Instatainment.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Il a l'air d'avoir des relations avec Instatainment.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: What was his name again? Ivan?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: C'était quoi son nom déjà ? Ivan ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: No way!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: C'est pas possible !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: That must have been \c[3]Mr. Vestorovich\c[0]!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Ça devait être \c[3]Monsieur Vestorovich\c[0] !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: He is a shareholder of Instatainment.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: C'est un actionnaire d'Instatainment.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I can barely believe this.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Je n'arrive pas à y croire.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: He is supposed to be such a busy person, yet here he was talking casually with Albert.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Il est censé être un homme très occupé, et pourtant il était là pour passer du bon temps avec Albert.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Lea, this is huge!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Lea, c'est notre chance !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Mr. Vestorovich, he has been active in the field of AI for some time now.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Mr. Vestorovich est depuis longtemps actif dans le domaine de l'IA.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I tried to get in touch with him back when Satoshi was still at Instatainment, but we never had any luck.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Quand Satoshi était encore chez Instatainment, on a essayé d'avoir des contacts avec lui, mais sans succès.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: However, since Albert seems to know him personally, we might get our chance to meet him.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Mais Albert le connait assez personnellement, On tient peut-être notre chance.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I am 100% positive he would be thrilled to learn about \c[3]Evotars\c[0]!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Je suis sûr à 100 % qu'il sera heureux d'apprendre l'existence des \c[3]Évotars\c[0] !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: So... now we just have to reach Albert and ask him about it...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Bon... maintenant il faut que l'on parle à Albert et qu'on lui demande...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: How?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Comment ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: That is the tricky part.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Ça va être difficile.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Remember the \c[3]hologram projector\c[0] in the meeting room of the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0]?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Tu te souviens du \c[3]projecteur holographique\c[0] dans la salle de réunion du \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: If we can meet him personally there, I might be able to talk to him directly.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Si on réussit à l'amener là-bas, je pourrais lui parler directement.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: It looks like he is \c[3]still online\c[0].
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: On dirait qu'il est \c[3]encore en ligne\c[0].

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Let us just head to the meeting room and see if he is close by.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Retournons dans la salle de réunion et voyons s'il est dans les environs.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Go to the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] and check if Albert is there.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Allez au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] et vérifiez si Albert est là.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Hm...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Hm...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: It's too bad that \c[3]Ivan\c[0] didn't have the chance to meet you...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: C'est vraiment dommage que \c[3]Ivan\c[0] n'ait pas eu la chance de te rencontrer...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Why?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Oh well...\. let's just say he is well connected with Instatainment.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Eh bien...\. disons juste qu'il a de très bonnes relations avec Instatainment.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: And I'm sure he would have been excited about Evotars.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Et je suis sûr qu'il aurait été intéressé par les Évotars.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Unfortunately, he just left for a business trip.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Malheureusement il est parti pour un voyage d'affaires.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: No chance to meet him anytime soon.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Aucune chance pour qu'on le rencontre pendant les prochains jours.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: It was very fortunate that you spotted me together with Ivan back then.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Tu as eu beaucoup de chance de m'avoir vu avec Ivan.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: He really seems to be excited about Evotars.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Il a l'air vraiment très intéressé par les Évotars.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: That will help a great deal when we start to talk with Instatainment.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Cela va beaucoup nous aider lorsqu'on commencera à discuter avec Instatainment.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Though I suppose the meeting could have gone better.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Bien que je pense que la réunion aurait pu mieux se passer.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Still...\. let's try our best to convince Instatainment.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Mais bon...\. Il faut tenter de convaincre Instatainment du mieux que l'on peut.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Oh!\. Were you just talking about Ivan?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Oh !\. Est-ce que vous parliez d'Ivan ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: No.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Non.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Come on!\. I want to meet him already!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Allez !\. Je finirais bien par le rencontrer !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Forget it!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Oublie ça !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I bet he's amazing at \c[3]BBQs\c[0],\. being a proper\. \c[3]steakholder\c[0]\. and all!
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Je suis sûr qu'il doit faire de bons \c[3]Barbecues\c[0],\. en étant un bon \c[3]"Steakholder"\c[0]\. et tout !

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Go away.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Va-t'en.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig:
And then, before I knew it...\.
it was already time to say goodbye.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text:
Et maintenant, avant que je m'en rende compte...\.
il était déjà temps de se dire au revoir.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Just what caused this bridge to collapse?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Mais qu'est-ce qui a pu faire effondrer ce pont ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: It's not like Avatars are heavy and can just break it.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Ce n'est pas comme si les Avatars étaient tellement lourds qu'ils pouvaient faire écrouler le pont.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Can't be the cars either, those are tied to a grid.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Ça ne peut pas être les voitures non plus, vu qu'elles sont attachées à une ligne électrique.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I'm more concerned with your obsession with sitting on the ground...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Je suis plus préoccupé par le fait que tu veilles absolument t'assoir sur le sol...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Man, I never saw him this excited...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Hé ben, je ne l'ai jamais vu aussi excité...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: At least we get some rest...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Au moins, comme ça on peut se reposer un peu...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Until the shop opens, that is.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Jusqu'à que le magasin ouvre, en tout cas.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: A painting is a memory that never fades.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Une peinture est une mémoire qui ne s'efface jamais.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Actually...\. paint does fade away with time...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: En fait...\. la couleur de la peinture s'estompe avec le temps...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Tronny, please...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Tronny, s'il te plaît...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: So, now we've essentially beaten the game, but to be honest...\. I don't really know how I should feel about that.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: OK, donc maintenant qu'on a fini le jeu...\. Je ne sais vraiment pas ce que je dois en penser.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Hm, how so?
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Hum, qu'est-ce que tu veux dire par là ?

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I mean, of course, we did it.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Je veux dire, bien sûr, on a réussi.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Revealed the last secret there is and even beat the last and hardest boss... and I had so much fun doing it.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: On a trouvé tous les secrets et même battu le dernier boss... Et à chaque fois j'ai toujours éprouvé beaucoup de plaisir.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: So... I can't just leave everything behind already, can I? I would not be able to handle it.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Mais... Je ne peux pas juste laisser ça derrière moi. Je ne vais pas pouvoir endurer cela.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Hm, I know that feeling and with time it will go away...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Hum, je sais ce que ça fait. Ça passe avec le temps...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: But it's also kinda cruel that way, since you will lose some great memories with it.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Mais c'est aussi assez cruel, parce que tu oublies plein de bons souvenirs.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Yeah...
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Oui...

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Thing is, the game hasn't fully ended yet. There will be more content added.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Le truc, c'est que le jeu n'est même pas encore terminé. Ils travaillent encore sur du nouveau contenu.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: But if you still feel that way, then... at least try to always keep it in the back of your head.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Mais si tu continues à ressentir cela, alors... au moins, essaie de le garder dans un coin de ta mémoire.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Pin a poster somewhere in your room or I don't know, draw something.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Accroche un poster dans ta chambre ou... je sais pas, dessine quelque chose.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Ah, you're right, I really don't want to forget any of my time spent here, it was too good to let that happen.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Tu as raison, je n'ai vraiment pas envie d'oublier le temps que j'ai passé ici. C'était si agréable.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: I think I will start looking for a poster right now, thank you for helping me.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: Je pense que je vais essayer de trouver un poster maintenant. Merci pour le conseil.

maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.orig: Oh, you're welcome.
maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.json/entities.text: De rien.
